metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35534 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In LibRaw, there is a memory corruption vulnerability within the "crxFreeSubbandData()" function (libraw\src\decoders\crx.cpp) when processing cr3 files.

criterions.comment: darktable: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
